alternativeNames: Hadji-Zade, Mirza; Hacızade, Mirza; Gökgöl, Mirza (Hacızade)
examples: Triticum spelta subsp. kuckuckianum Gökgöl in Getreide & Mehl, 7: 80 (1963).
notes: née Hacizade; in Dec 1934, the last name was changed to: Gökgöl
source: Michiel van Slageren. Example from Tropicos; Biography in: Sci. Works (Azerbaycan) 5: 227-231. 2015; Genet  Resour Crop Evol 65:693–711. 2018, https://doi.org/10.1007/s10722-018-0606-9 (via Alexander B. Doweld; IFPNI)
